fresh off a seasonopening trip to Rice in which No PERIOD  Stanford  took one out of three games the Cardinal head home to take on the crossBay rival California Golden Bears  in the home opener at Sunken Diamond today at  p.m PERIOD

Mother nature provided an extra day off for Stanford following its Houston road trip this weekend PERIOD Todays game was originally scheduled for yesterday at  p.m. but the rain caused Stanford to postpone the first of five meetings against Cal this season PERIOD

Last season Stanford and Cal split the season series with each team winning two of the four games PERIOD Stanford started the series with a  thrashing of Cal in Berkeley in nonconference action PERIOD However Cal got the last laugh spoiling Stanfords chances at a topeight national seed in the NCAA Tournament with wins over the Cardinal on Friday  in  innings  and Saturday   marking Stanfords biggest margin of defeat of   in the last regular season series for both squads PERIOD

Cal head coach David Esquer  makes his annual return to The Farm to take on his former college coach and boss Mark Marquess PERIOD Esquer who served as Marquess No PERIOD  assistant from  to  is entering his fourteenth season at the helm of the Bears PERIOD

Cal enters todays contest coming off a threegame sweep of Michigan in Berkeley PERIOD However the sweep was anything but easy for the Bears PERIOD Cal won by one run in walkoff fashion in all three contests needing extra innings in two of the three to dispose of the pesky Wolverines PERIOD

Designated hitter Devon Rodriguez leads the Golden Bears with a . batting average on the young season PERIOD Cal freshman left fielder Brian Celsis college career got started with a bang when he knocked in the gamewinning run in the bottom of the ninth Sunday to secure the sweep PERIOD That hit represented Celsis lone RBI but he is second on the team with a . batting average PERIOD

For Stanford the pitchers have gotten off to a strong start but the hitting has lagged behind PERIOD Stanfords staff ERA in the weekend series against Rice was . led by freshmen Marcus Brakeman Daniel Starwalt and Bobby Zarubin who combined for . scoreless innings of relief PERIOD

The one freshman pitcher to allow runs at Rice on Sunday was starter Logan James PERIOD The lefty got off to a tough start allowing the first three runners of the game to score while recording only one out PERIOD However James buckled down retiring eight straight hitters and allowing only one additional base runner in his remaining . innings of work PERIOD

At the plate Stanford only managed to hit . on the weekend PERIOD Junior Danny Diekroeger and senior Justin Ringo lead all Cardinal hitters with a . batting average PERIOD Junior Austin Wilson missed the final two games of the Rice series because of an arm injury PERIOD Wilsons role in todays game could provide insight into how serious the injury is PERIOD

After Cal Stanford hosts Fresno State at Sunken Diamond in a three game series starting Friday PERIOD First pitch Friday night is scheduled for  p.m PERIOD
